meanings.definition: The quality or state of being massive.
meanings.sent1: The massiveness of the mountain was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The elephant's massiveness made it stand out in the herd.
meanings.sent3: The cake's massiveness was so impressive that it seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent4: The massiveness of the tree's roots symbolized strength and stability.
meanings.sent5: The massiveness of the waterfall created a sense of awe and wonder.

meanings.definition: The extent or bulk of a body.
meanings.sent1: The massiveness of the ship was evident as it sailed into the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The massiveness of the building made it a landmark in the city.
meanings.sent3: The massiveness of the snowman made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The massiveness of the wave crashing against the shore was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The massiveness of the dinosaur skeleton in the museum amazed visitors.
